Class ConsumableItem

java.lang.Object
gamePackages.items.Item
gamePackages.items.ConsumableItem
public class ConsumableItem extends Item
Represents a consumable item in the game. The `ConsumableItem` class extends the `Item` class and introduces additional attributes and behaviors specific to consumable items, such as quantity, effects, and timing.

  • Constructor Details

    • ConsumableItem

      public ConsumableItem()
      Default constructor for creating an uninitialized consumable item.

    • ConsumableItem

      public ConsumableItem(String name, float posX, float posY, String spritePath, String type, float value) throws IllegalItemException
      Constructs a consumable item with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item.
      posX - The X-coordinate of the item's position.
      posY - The Y-coordinate of the item's position.
      spritePath - The file path to the sprite texture for the item.
      type - The subtype of the item (e.g., HP, Speed).
      value - The value of the item's effect.
      Throws:
      IllegalItemException - If the specified subtype is not valid.

    • ConsumableItem

      public ConsumableItem(String name, float posX, float posY, String spritePath, String type, float value, int quantity, float timing)
      Constructs a `ConsumableItem` with detailed parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item.
      posX - The X-coordinate of the item's position.
      posY - The Y-coordinate of the item's position.
      spritePath - The file path to the sprite texture for the item.
      type - The subtype of the item (e.g., "HP", "Speed").
      value - The value of the item's effect.
      quantity - The initial quantity of the item.
      timing - The duration of the item's effect.

    • getCurrSubType

      public String getCurrSubType() throws ZeroSubTypeException, IllegalItemException
      Gets the current active subtype of the item.
      Returns:
      The active subtype of the item as a string.
      Throws:
      ZeroSubTypeException - If no subtype is active.
      IllegalItemException - If multiple subtypes are active.

    • use

      public void use(Player player) throws ZeroSubTypeException, IllegalItemException
      Uses the consumable item, applying its effect to the player.
      Specified by:
      use in class Item
      Parameters:
      player - The player using the item.
      Throws:
      ZeroSubTypeException - If the item has no active subtype.
      IllegalItemException - If the item has multiple active subtypes or no quantity.

    • consumItem

      public void consumItem(Player player) throws ZeroSubTypeException, IllegalItemException
      Consumes the item and applies its effect to the player, adding it to the player's active effects.
      Parameters:
      player - The player consuming the item.
      Throws:
      ZeroSubTypeException - If the item has no active subtype.
      IllegalItemException - If the item has multiple active subtypes or no quantity.

    • reverseEffect

      public void reverseEffect(Player player) throws ZeroSubTypeException, IllegalItemException
      Reverses the effect of the item on the player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player on whom the effect is reversed.
      Throws:
      ZeroSubTypeException - If the item has no active subtype.
      IllegalItemException - If the item has multiple active subtypes.

      Renders the consumable item on the screen.
      Parameters:

      camera - The camera used to adjust the projection matrix.
